track_info.note: Averaged from 6 tracks - vintage analog excellence

characteristics.sound_profile: Vintage excellence - balanced frequency, exceptional dynamics
characteristics.mastering_philosophy: Natural analog tape compression, musical variation
characteristics.quality: Audiophile tier - better than most modern remasters
special_notes: 50% of tracks are mid-dominant (classic 1970s rock sound)
16.4 dB LUFS variation is intentional progressive rock dynamics
No loudness-compression correlation (r=+0.156) unlike modern productions

processing_recommendations.era_specific_notes: Minimal enhancement only - source is already excellent
